This is eating away at my paranoia in the sense that it feels like everyone is conspiring against him. If it goes the route of no NTR which is unlikely then this was pretty slice of life in terms of the anxiety of a secret relationship and jealousy. If it goes the route of NTR then there's so many people who are clearly trying to spare his feelings that I don't think he'll ever be able to walk out into society again.

Read this: The netorare will come. This is the build-up. Let me tell you why: NTR is the punchline. If you don't deliver the punchline, it becomes a tease. Teases don't last. The punchline will come in hard and it will make you rage and that emotion will make the work memorable, even if you hate it. That's the triumph of an author. So if you want to avoid the NTR, leave now while you can, the more you get invested, the harder it will hit. Worst thing is, you will like it. You will read this again, a second time. You will become what you hate.
who knows .If stretching out the jebaiting gets more audience then it may very well have a happy or an open ending
